column5: Hi,  Just wondering if anyone can recommend a cottage to rent for a week or just a weekend. Me and my fiancee want to rent a cottage and go fishing, and this time she want to catch a fish. We are willing to drive upto 2 to 3 hours.  Thanks in advance.
Golden Beach Resort in Rice Lake should be good for you.  It's located 1.5 hours drive from Toronto. Golden Beach Resort

Well I know a nice couple that just renovated a house and are starting a bed and breakfast kinda deal, a seperate apartment with own kitchen and stuff, one room and own sitting area, its on Stoney Lake, awsome house and awsome people.  Newly renovated...has a whirlpool tub I think, and a patio, they have a small beach area and a boat not sure if the boat is an extra charge but if you PM me I can give you there number!

Father-in-law has a place on main land ...between Penetang and Midland on Georgian Bay...but doubt you wanna pay the $2400/wk that he gets for it all summer long. Also has a place out on Present Island but don't know what it rents for. Probably 1/2 of the above.
http://www.rockpineresort.com/  I stayed at this place a few times with the wife and kids, it was a nice clean place, lots of sheltered water to fish. It has been a lot of years.
Thank you very much for the replies!
